item.title: Bromley churchill park pond, 9th July
item.description:
The pond in the park (near playground) has no water in it left. All of the wildlife has gone. There needs to be water in the pond as it is one of the main featured of the park, i go there a lot for my mental health to admire the wildlife, this is heartbreaking to see

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tetty Way, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: You need to red route, 9th July

item.title: Footpath is becoming overgrown and impassable., 9th July
item.description:
The hedges along the footpath are becoming very overgrown with many extended branches at face height making walking a bit of an obstacle course - worse when wet. Please clear this asap, thanks.

Report on FixMyStreet
